Gleamdance Dagger

Gleamdance Dagger: Glowing: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Off-Hand OnlyGleamdancer: When this dagger is wielded in the off-hand, the wielder gains a +1 bonus to Armour Class.

A pair of pixie wings were used to create this pretty blade - their delicate tracings can be seen all day and night, though
